location.name: Apartment
location.description: You wake up in a sunny apartment, head splitting. You see a coat with a yellow badge.

location.name: Street
location.description: You go out on to the street. You can go east or west.

location.name: Side alley
location.description: You go up a side alley and learn something new.

location.name: Tram stop
location.description: You come by a tram stop. Someone recognises your badge and tells you to find the club!

location.name: Industrial area
location.description: You're in a bleak industrial area and fight someone.

location.name: Club door
location.description: You find your way to the club and answer the bouncer's challenge.

location.name: Club
location.description: You're in the club! You win!
